body.name: 6 PCS Silicone Straw Cover for Stanley Cup 40/30 oz Accessories for Stanley Cups Dulinkas Straw Tips Reusable Cute Straw Covers Cap Fit For 9-10mm Straws 6 Colors Mini-Cup

Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 4 hrs 58 mins
features: ✅Protect Your Drinks: The silicone straw cover efficiently protects the straw, preventing not only dust and bugs but also spills and leaks. Keep your straw and drink clean and hygienic, especially when traveling or participating in outdoor activities.

✅Personalized Design: The straw topper for Stanley Cups features a unique and fashionable design, adding a personalized touch to the appearance of the Stanley Cup. You can choose different colors to make your cups stand out.

✅Perfect Size: Our Straw Protector fits all straws with an outer diameter of 9–10 mm (about 0.36–0.4 inches), making it suitable for the majority of Stanley Cup shapes and sizes. You can confidently use it with your preferred cup.
✅Superior Material: The Straw Tips Cover is composed of strong, environmentally safe silicone that will not break down with time. The product's exceptional quality will draw you in.

✅User-Friendly: The Lids Protectors install and remove quickly and easily, allowing you to use it with your Stanley Cup for a comfortable drinking experience. The Straw Covers are also dishwasher-safe and easy to clean.

✅Package Content: You will get 6 different colors of Mini-cup-pattern cute straw covers, providing you with enough options to meet your needs and preferences. With our straw cap replacement, you may enjoy your drinks without anxiety.

✅Great Gift Choice: The Straw Cover for Stanley Cup makes a perfect gift for friends, family, or colleagues who own a Stanley Cup or other brand sports water bottles. Its practicality, stylish design, and eco-friendly nature make it a thoughtful and unique present.

✅Best Service: We're committed to providing the best service to our customers. We are available to address any inquiries, concerns, or issues regarding the straw cover, ensuring a pleasant and satisfactory shopping experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good to have
reviews.reviewText: I like not second guessing if a bug has crawled into my straw and subsequently down into my drink... admittedly this has never actually happened to me so my fear is a but unwarranted... but... I just can't shake it so being able to cap the straw off gives me lots of peace of mind .... I did think I ordered another version , I think they were coffee cups or something similar, but what I got was the daisy version... not a huge deal and still does the trick ;) definitely worth the asking price, which at the time of this review is I think roughly $6.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays Put on your Stanely
reviews.reviewText: I like how the 6 PCS Silicone Cloud Straw Cover for Stanley Cups are made of a softer, more pliable silicone so they stay on your Stanley straw better than some of the other ones we have. The clouds have adorable Kawaii smiley faces on them and come in off-white (cream), white, pink, yellow, light lavender, and light blue. My teen and her friends just loved them, and I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked well looks good, is stylish and useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and functional
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to add to my daughter's Christmas present which was a new Stanley. She's delighted with the straw covers and uses them constantly. This helps keep anything from going in the straw and lessens spills if she tips it over. My only complaint is that you do need to be careful how you pull the cover off when taking a drink. If you pull on the tip of the straw cover, the "lid" actually starts to separate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were a gift for someone who loves their Stanley cup. They were a hit. They fit well and function as intended. The colors were nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique Stanley Cup Straw Covers
reviews.reviewText: These are mini stanley cup straw covers for your Stanley cup. They fit easily over the straw to protect it from bacteria. The straw cover is made of silicone so they are soft and flexible. I think you can easily wash these with soap and water. You get several of these cup straw covers in the pack. They are various colors. These are so cute and functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Colorful and Eco-Friendly Upgrade to Your Sipping Experience!
reviews.reviewText: The assortment of colors in this pack is a standout feature. From cool blues and greens to warm pinks and oranges, the silicone straw covers add a playful and cheerful vibe to my drinks. Not only are they visually appealing, but they also make it easy to differentiate between different drinks when sharing with friends or family.The silicone material is of high quality, providing a snug fit over various straw sizes. I appreciate how versatile they are, accommodating both regular and smoothie straws effortlessly. The covers are also easy to clean – a quick rinse or toss in the dishwasher, and they are good to go for the next use. The durability of the silicone ensures that these covers can withstand regular use without losing their shape or vibrant colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So freaking cute and work great
